entity.name: Serenity BDD Project
entity.description: Serenity BDD is an open-source test automation framework that helps teams write maintainable acceptance tests and produce rich, readable reports (living documentation). Funding supports ongoing maintenance, technology upgrades (including Playwright integration aligned with established Serenity patterns such as Screenplay), documentation, and contributor support. Requested funding amounts represent upper bounds; work will be prioritised pragmatically based on available funding and maintainer capacity.

projects.name: Serenity BDD
projects.description: Serenity BDD is a test automation library designed to make writing automated acceptance tests easier, and more fun. It supports BDD-style workflows and produces rich reports to help teams understand, maintain, and trust their tests.

channels.description: Direct bank transfer available on request (email the maintainers for details).

plans.name: Core maintenance and stability
plans.description: Maintainer time for issue triage, bug fixes, dependency/security updates, and PR review to keep Serenity BDD reliable.

plans.name: Technology upgrades and integration work
plans.description: Targeted upgrades to keep pace with modern tooling (e.g., improving Playwright integration aligned with Screenplay patterns) and CI/tooling modernisation.

plans.name: Documentation and contributor support
plans.description: Improve docs, examples, and onboarding materials; coordinate low-overhead contributor support (e.g., office hours, sprints).
